data.what_is: PushSend's all-in-one SaaS solution enables you to create, market, and manage all of your email campaigns, landing pages and events.
data.product_description: Easily create, market, and manage all of your email campaigns, Landing pages, and events. PushSend's all-in-one solution enables you to create beautiful email campaigns, build engaging landing pages and market great events.

initial_reviews.review_title: Solution for mail automation and ticket issual
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about PushSend?
Mail automation is the major attractiona and we can customise forms and even use it for ticket management system.

What do you dislike about PushSend?
Nothing at all. Each and every feature is attractive.

What problems is PushSend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mail automation. TMS
